title: Textile, 1995-50-187, 1800–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: :printed by engraved roller on plain weave.
inscribed: In the middle at the base of a pillar, 'I F C".
dimensions:
Warp: 103cm (40 1/2in.)
Weft: 77.5cm (30 1/2in.) Both selvedges present. 
Height of repeat: 46cm (18in.)
description: Two scenes of courtiers and the clergy at the court of the English King, Henry VIII. The reference may be to Henry's dispute with the church. In purple on white.
